document.full_text: los angeles angels pitcher scot shields, one of the premier set-up relievers of the past decade, announced his retirement from major league baseball, the team said on friday.
document.title: angels reliever shields retires after brilliant career
lines_and_colors: los angeles angels pitcher scot shields, one of the premier set-up relievers of the past decade, announced his retirement from major league baseball, the team said on friday.
